data.text: @EricTopol @joewalkerWSJ @Novavax Another bad vaccine with spike protein ready to ruin  your body.
@Jackbeachwalker @EricTopol @joewalkerWSJ @Novavax What do they approve Pfizer for, then? I thought they're extremely effective. Take the jab and then the plane, right?

@AnandaIrie @EricTopol @joewalkerWSJ @Novavax Maybe. Yes. However, number of Covid-19 cases start to skyrocket at a lot of places, Hong Kong, South Korea, Germany, Netherlands, Austria, Switzerland, New Zealand, UK again ... others (eg US, China) probably soon to follow. So a good reason to take any vaccine now.
@Kwak05822769 @EricTopol @joewalkerWSJ @Novavax Too late, maybe? Where I live people act like the pandemic is over - vaccinated or not. Been that way for many months now.
@Kwak05822769 @EricTopol @joewalkerWSJ @Novavax IT'S BEEN A WEEK. Give it time.

@odd_bodkins @EricTopol @joewalkerWSJ @Novavax High level of efficacy was maintained over a 6-month period and the analysis showed vaccine efficacy of 82.5% in protection against all COVID-19 infections â€“ both symptomatic & asymptomatic.  This was in their press release on Feb 28th #nvax

https://t.co/INMv8CuepH

@TimBank42787482 @AlYap73961573 @AlisaValdesRod1 @EricTopol @joewalkerWSJ @Novavax While no data just yet for Omicron due to the the fact that this variant is so new, we probably could assume that it should be effective against it because its effective against delta. I have seen somewhere saying that nvax efficiency against delta is higher than PFE.

@AITargaryen @AlYap73961573 @AlisaValdesRod1 @EricTopol @joewalkerWSJ @Novavax Thats fine. And i don't fault you for that. But quoting alpha covid tests saying it's 90% effective is disingenuous and we don't know if novavax is effective for omicron yet.  Which is 99% of covid out there so it'd be nice to know if it's effective before it's touted as the best
